1.0.name: wordpress/gezuar-festen-e-flamurit
1.0.description:
You can use this plugin for a special day, which is 28th of November, the Independence day of Albania. You can put the Albanian flag and anthem into your blog.

If you refresh the page, you may see the flag change its side, like first it's in the right corner, than you can see it in the left one.

If you are interested, I can make a custom plugin like this for anyone that wants. Just contact me.
